content: {"name": "Echo House Multi-Service Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "If you are not a resident of 21217 then a referral is needed.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.echohouse.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1705 West Fayette Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Franklin Square", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21223", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.2894123, "longitude": -76.6441464}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 947-2028", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Handicapped Access"}]}
